name: Passage of Styx
description:
Submission for Extra Credit's Game jam
https://itch.io/jam/extra-credits-game-jam-5

After crossing the river styx, you must shed your past to pass on.

Please note that this game contains shaking screen effects and harsh sounds

CONTROLS

A - Left
D - Right
W - Jump
S - Ground Pound
Space - Punch
Mouse - Move camera
Left click - Fire projectile

A game jam game created to the theme, "Passage" Made in roughly 4 days. It's definitely rough around the edges in more ways then one. We might clean this one up and properly release it as a short game, nothing set yet though.

Created by -

Music by Kallai

Programming by Xeviorus and Kira

Art by Fayrek
